info.description:
This API will return a list of information for employees who report to a manager.

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/labor/manager`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Labor Manager Employees

tags.name: Employee
tags.description: Get information about Employees who report to a Manager

get.summary: Returns employee information from manager id
get.description:
Returns a collection of data for employees who report to a manager

![This endpoint is in production](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusprod.png)

200.description: Provides the Supervisor data for an employee

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP Header variable will route to the Integration environment.  Only applicable in QA Server

apikey.name: apikey
apikey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify security

employee_id.description: Unqiue ID for the employee's manager
